title: Advanced Presence Practice
subtitle: Deepening into effortless awareness
description: For practitioners with a solid meditation foundation. Moving beyond technique into direct awareness. The practice of non-practice.

questions.question: What is the 'practice of non-practice'?
options: Resting in awareness without effortful manipulation, letting presence be natural
Only meditating when you feel like it

questions.question: What happens to techniques at advanced stages?
options: They become transparent - used when needed but not depended upon
